articles.author: By  MAAYAN JAFFE-HOFFMAN
articles.title: Could DNA vaccines be the next tool in the world’s battle against COVID? - The Jerusalem Post
articles.description: India last month said that it had created the world’s first DNA vaccine, ZyCoV-D. While standard vaccines use actual 'hardware' protein,  DNA vaccines use the 'software' blueprint of the virus.
